snippet: The police detained a man and a woman in southern France on Tuesday on suspicion of abetting the killing of seven people in Toulouse last March.
abstract: Police detain man and woman in southern France on suspicion of providing assistance to Mohammed Merah, gunman who killed seven people in Toulouse in March.
lead_paragraph: The police detained a man and a woman in southern France on Tuesday on suspicion of abetting the killing of seven people in Toulouse last March.

headline.main: France: Two Suspects Detained in Toulouse Killings
headline.print_headline: France: Two Suspects Detained in Toulouse Killings
